text: Anyone care to share the experience of launching something on the marketplace? What were things you did right or wrong, things you wish you knew before doing it?

Hi <@U0276HSQAE8> we have launched a theme and a few templates in the past.  Also done some private-labelled for other partners.  Definitely important to treat it like it's a project and not a side-gig.  We treated them all as a side-gig and they took way longer than they should have to get done :slightly_smiling_face:
How long did the approval process to get on the marketplace take?
We’re launching an integration in the next month and I’m trying to plan for all contingencies.

One thing I would suggest is to check marketplace requirements at <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/app-marketplace-listing-requirements> , there are some details that can get missed. Approval may take a few days and we need to prepare to resolve reported issues, so don't make it too tight. :slightly_smiling_face:
Is there a preference from the HubSpot side that installation happens directly through the marketplace link or is sending them to a page on our site equally acceptable?
I think installation has to happen through the marketplace link.  At least on themes etc.  Apps might be slightly different.

Hey <@U0276HSQAE8>,

There could be several things based on your solution but, here are a few general points:

1. The installation may differ based on the solution you plan to publish in the App marketplace like App or Theme.
2. Please check for the minimum requirement of Installation before submitting an App to get approval from HubSpot...probably the installation should be > 3
3. If you are building an app that requires HubSpot scopes, take care that only necessary scopes should be used during OAuth call.
4. The most of themes get installed directly from HubSpot App Marketplace.
5. You can utilise the direct HubSpot link at your side as well, and users can access it.
6. Keep checking for the users' feedback once your App/ theme gets live.
7. If you need feedback for your newly launched Theme or App, you can post the requirements here:
      <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/bd-p/designers_bestpractice|https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Share-Your-Work/bd-p/designers_bestpractice>
Thanks! It’s an integration, so not a theme or template.
This is for anybody who can answer.
I need to know if there's a way to be able to link directly to an asset in the marketplace so we can market our assets...?
Good to know and Glad to discuss :-)
